title.narrative: CSR-Facility: Strengthen Danish efforts on Ethical Trade

description.narrative:
The overall objective of the project is to bring about real improvements in the global value chains of Danish companies through a dialogue and collaboration on ethical trade in practice. The project will take the collaboration on ethical trade to a new level by making DIEH a Centre of Excellence with a state of art knowledge and communication center and an ethical hub where dilemmas and challenges can be discussed and through dialogue and collaboration translated into concrete initiatives.
The project will increase Danish companies' knowledge on the latest trends in the area of ethical trade; promote knowledge-sharing as well as exchange of experiences between Danish companies as well as between Danish companies and their stakeholders; strengthen Danish companies' capacity to advance ethical trade; develop solutions to dilemmas and challenges with a multistakeholder approach; advance the Danish debate on ethical trade; and engage more Danish companies in ethical trade.
